summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of East Sixty-fifth Street, from Brooklyn Avenue to Seventeenth Avenue Northeast, all in the City of Seattle, by laying a water main of proper dimensions in said street, together with all the necessary gates, tees, crosses, and other appurtenances which may be necessary for the reasonable water service and fire protection of said district, in accordance with Resolution No. 670 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
